page.title: 02RADIO VICTORY
page.content: Starting in 1975,it broadcasts to more than one third of the population of Portsmouth area.Radio Victory has about 100 people on its payroll.Radio Victory got its name from the ship H.M.S. Victory.Its main programmes are about music and news.Weather and AA reports are also put out'on the air'. There are also Special Features like 'JOB SEARCH' and 'POSH UP POMPEY'.The job of a presenter is very interesting and they get to meet a whole variety of people.As it is a small station, the presenters of shows have to do all their own background work, finding all information needed and what to put on shows.Radio Victory is a popular station ,and will continue to build more ambitious projects in leading the area towards greater self-fulfilment.
